Pre-Game Insights: Both Martinique and Guyana are without a point in Group A of the CONCACAF Nations League heading into the match.
Martinique have struggled in their opening matches, conceding early and failing to maintain momentum.
Guyana, despite some possession, have not been threatening in their previous matches.
Marvin Bellance and Isaiah Jones are making their international debuts for their respective teams.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The match is taking place at Stade Municipal Pierre-Aliker in Fort-de-France.
Les Matinino have a strong home record against Guyana, winning their previous encounters.
Others: Martinique have not scored in the second half of their previous Nations League fixtures in Fort-de-France.
Guyana have not lost consecutive Nations League matches since 2019.
